sentences.en: A high fever is an early manifestation of the disease.
sentences.cn: 发高烧是这种疾病的表现症状之一.

sentences.en: Art is a manifestation of emotion and emotion speaks a language that all may understand.
sentences.cn: 艺术是感情的表露,艺术使用的是一种人人都能理解的语言.

sentences.en: By epiphany he means'sudden spiritual manifestation'.
sentences.cn: 他的“显现”指的是“神灵的突现 ”.

sentences.en: Different animals in the colony had different manifestations of the disease.
sentences.cn: 同一群体的不同动物对同一疾病有不同的表现形式。

sentences.en: Fever is one manifestation of a cold.
sentences.cn: 发烧是受凉的一种表现.

sentences.en: Fever is one manifestation of cold.
sentences.cn: 发烧是感冒的一种表现形式.

sentences.en: He even supposes that art is a manifestation of the sexual instinct.
sentences.cn: 他甚至认为艺术也是性本能的一种流露.

sentences.en: Hypoglycemia is sometimes a prominent clinical manifestation.
sentences.cn: 低血糖症有时是显著的临床表现.

sentences.en: I have never seen such a fear manifestation.
sentences.cn: 我从未见过这样的恐惧神情.

sentences.en: Many animals were seen as the manifestation of a deity.
sentences.cn: 许多动物被看作神的化身.

sentences.en: Objective To cure various clinical manifestation of spontaneous pneumothorax ( SP ) through various measures.
sentences.cn: 目的通过对多种自发性气胸的临床表现采用不同的治疗方法,达到治愈的效果.

sentences.en: The riots are a clear manifestation of the people's discontent.
sentences.cn: 骚乱清楚地表明了人们的不满情绪。

sentences.en: This disease may develop insidiously, with fever as the only clinical manifestation.
sentences.cn: 这种病可能隐袭发生, 仅有发热为其唯一的临床表现.

sentences.en: This gives the type of display that accompanies manifestation of the power.
sentences.cn: 这里给出了伴随该异能的展现产生的异象的种类.

sentences.en: Toxic manifestation are usually associated with borate concentration in excess of 10.0 mg / 1 OOml of blood.
sentences.cn: 血液中硼酸盐浓度升高与中毒现象有关.

sentences.en: What we call mass is only another manifestation of energy.
sentences.cn: 我们称之为质量的东西只是能的另一种形态.

trans.tran_en: a very clear sign that a particular situation or feeling exists
